T02D1389:8a-25: pa'i don du rjes su mthun pa'i dpe gsungs pa
T02D1389:8a-26: so // / pra phab pa'i sgrub pa bos bsams pa /
T02D1389:8a-27: dngos skyes min pa chom rkun la sogs pa bems po'i chos las skyes pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D1389:8a-28: rnam par ma brtags par mthong ba 'di la dngos
T02D1389:8a-29: po dang dngos po med pa dag yod pa ma
T02D1389:8a-30: yin te / dang po ma yin pa'i don bya
T02D1389:8a-31: ba'i 'bras bu can nyid tsam nye bar dmigs pa'i
T02D1389:8a-32: yin te / phyir ro // 'jig rten na'ang dngos
T02D1389:8a-33: po ba med pa'i don yang sgyu ma dang rmi
T02D1389:8a-34: lam dang dbang po'i gzhu la sogs pa mthong ngo
T02D1389:8a-35: yin te / phyir ro // // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1389:8a-36: med pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1389:8a-37: de yang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes pa las skyes pa'o //
T02D1389:8a-38: rnam pa thams cad pa'i 'gro ba'i don phun sum
T02D1389:8a-39: tshogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir yid bzhin gyi
T02D1389:8a-41: dpe dag gsungs pa'i sngon ma mthong ba'i rkun mo
T02D1389:8a-42: la sogs pas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mig
T02D1389:8a-43: gis gzhon nu ma 'dir gnas pas pra phab par
T02D1389:8a-45: sgrub pa po'i skyes bu rnams kyis ni gnas de
T02D1389:8a-46: dang der song nas gzhon nu mas smras pa thun
T02D1389:8a-47: mong ba'i mig ngag gis mthong ngo //
T02D1389:8b-0: rnal 'byor @8b ba byang chub kyi sems zla ba
T02D1389:8b-1: ma g-yos pas ni grub pa'i man ngag gi sngags
T02D1389:8b-2: kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mig can gyi gzhon nu
T02D1389:8b-3: ma bzhin du man ngag med pa'i so so skye
T02D1389:8b-4: bos rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa nam mkha'
T02D1389:8b-5: la mthong ba'o // de yang spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su gsungs pa /
T02D1389:8b-6: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1389:8b-7: gzhan gyi mig dpral ba la sogs pa na yod
T02D1389:8b-8: pa dag gis mi mthong zhing rang gi mig dag
T02D1389:8b-10: gzhan gyi tshe ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1389:8b-11: pra phab pa'i dpe 'dis rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum
T02D1389:8b-12: ni rnam pa thams cad du rang bzhin med pa'i
T02D1389:8b-13: phyir ma skyes pa rmi lam du gzhon nu mas
T02D1389:8b-14: bu nye bar dmigs pa lta bur thams cad mkhyen
T02D1389:8b-16: ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdor gsungs pa /
T02D1389:8b-17: ji ltar rmi lam nang 'dir gzhon nu ma //
T02D1389:8b-18: de yis bu skyes pa dang shi ba'ang mthong //
T02D1389:8b-19: skyes na dga' dang shi na mya ngan gnas //
T02D1389:8b-20: de lta'i dpe yis chos kun shes par gyis ;
T02D1389:8b-22: gzugs brnyan zhes pa rnam pa thams cad pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan no //
T02D1389:8b-23: srog rtsol ni lte ba las steng dang 'og gi
T02D1389:8b-24: rtsa gsum gsum rnams su rim pa ji lta bar
T02D1389:8b-25: srog dang thur sel gyi rlung dag 'gog pa ste
T02D1389:8b-26: / srog rtsol ni lus la sogs pa'i khams 'gog par byed pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1389:8b-27: ci ltar gyur pa rnams su zhe na /
T02D1389:8b-28: steng du g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dang dbu ma rnams su dang /
T02D1389:8b-29: 'og tu dbu ma dang g-yon pa dang g-yas pa
T02D1389:8b-30: rnams su zla ba la sogs pa'i khams 'bab pa
T02D1389:8b-31: rnams su ste / de bzhin du chu la sogs pa 'bab pa rnams la'o //
T02D1389:8b-32: gzhan rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis po rnams
T02D1389:8b-33: kyis skye ba'i gnas nyid kyi phyir rigs rnams la'o
T02D1389:8b-35: steng du zla ba la sogs pa'i rtsa gsum lus dang ngag dang sems rnams te /
T02D1389:8b-36: 'og tu bshad ba la sogs pa'i rtsa gsum yang ngo //
T02D1389:8b-38: de la thabs kyi ste khu ba'i khams kyi zla ba'i rtsa sku ru 'gyur ro //
T02D1389:8b-39: shes rab kyi ste rdul gyi khams kyi nyi ma'i rtsa gsung du 'gyur ro //
T02D1389:8b-40: rdul gyi khams kho na'i bshad ba'i rtsa ni sku'o //
T02D1389:8b-41: gtso bo ste khu ba'i khams kyi gci ba 'bab pa gsung yin no //
T02D1389:8b-42: steng zhes pa khu ba'i khams kyi thugs sgra gcan 'bab pa ste /
T02D1389:9a-1: gyi khams kyi thugs khu ba 'bab ma'o //
T02D1389:9a-2: steng 'og rigs drug ces pa chu dang rlung dang
T02D1389:9a-3: nam mkha' 'bab pa rnams thabs kyi yan lag nyid
T02D1389:9a-4: kyi phyir dang / sa dang me dang ye shes
T02D1389:9a-5: 'bab pa rnams shes rab kyi yan lag nyid kyi
T02D1389:9a-6: kyi phyir dang / phyir ro // phyed dang bcas
T02D1389:9a-7: pa'i zla ba bcu dang ldan pa'i lo dgu bcu
T02D1389:9a-8: rtsa drug gi nang du 'chi ba de 'chad par
T02D1389:9a-9: 'gyur pa'i nges pas 'chi ltas su 'gyur te lhag
T02D1389:9a-10: pa'i rlung 'bab pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1389:9a-11: mun can zhes pa la sogs pa mdor bstan pa ste /
T02D1389:9a-12: de'i rgyas par bshad pa skye dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1389:9a-13: khu ba 'bab pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T02D1389:9a-14: aa wa dh'u t'i yang skye ba la sogs pa'i dus gsum du 'bab po //
T02D1389:9a-15: gzhan yang dus sbyor bcu gnyis la 'khor bar mtshungs
T02D1389:9a-16: pa'i phyir nyi ma'i ste srog gi rlung gi lug
T02D1389:9a-17: la sogs pa'i dus sbyor gyi bdag nyid sna bug
T02D1389:9a-18: g-yon pa nas glang la sogs pa'i dus sbyor gyi
T02D1389:9a-19: bdag nyid g-yas pa'i bu gar 'pho ba na mnyam
T02D1389:9a-20: pa zhes bya ba yang 'bab po /
T02D1389:9a-22: dus sbyor 'char ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1389:9a-23: zla ba dang nyi ma dag la mnyam pa 'bab pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o //
T02D1389:9a-25: rkang zhes pa la sogs pa ste dus sbyor gcig
T02D1389:9a-26: 'char pa'i mngon mtshams su 'jug pa dang 'byung ba
T02D1389:9a-27: dag gcig tu byas pa'i rkang pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D1389:9a-29: de bzhin du nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dus sbyor
T02D1389:9a-30: bcu gnyis kyi mtshams su bdun cu rtsa lngas lhag
T02D1389:9a-32: sems can thams cad kyi lus la gang drug brgyas
T02D1389:9a-33: lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig po rnams
T02D1389:9a-34: bdun cu rtsa lngas lhag pa'i drug brgya po 'di
T02D1389:9a-35: yis dman pa rnams la la n'a dang ra sa
T02D1389:9a-36: n'a 'bab po // nyin zhag so sor dbu ma'i
T02D1389:9a-37: bdun cu rtsa lngas lhag pa'i drug brgya po rnams
T02D1389:9a-38: lo brgya'i nyin zhag stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug
T02D1389:9a-40: de las nyin zhag gi dbugs drug brgyas lhag pa'i
T02D1389:9a-41: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rnams kyis bgos nas
T02D1389:9a-42: thob pa de rnams nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga
T02D1389:9a-43: lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig rnams so //
T02D1389:9a-44: de rnams kyang nyin zhag drug cus lhag pa'i sum
T02D1389:9a-45: brgya rnams kyi rnam par phye pa rnams phyogs gsum
T02D1389:9a-46: gyis lhag pa'i lo gsum rnams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1389:9b-0: @9b steng du g-yon pa gang yin pa de kho
T02D1389:9b-1: na zla ba dang rkyang ma dang lug dang chu
T02D1389:9b-2: 'bab pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med
T02D1389:9b-4: g-yas pa ni nyi ma dang ser skya dang gzhan
T02D1389:9b-5: zhes pa ro ma dang me 'bab pa rin chen
T02D1389:9b-6: 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin yang ngo //
T02D1389:9b-7: 'og tu dbu ma bshad ba'i rtsa dang sa 'bab
T02D1389:9b-8: pa ste rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin yang
T02D1389:9b-9: ngo // g-yon pa ni gci ba'i rtsa dang rlung 'bab pa ste /
T02D1389:9b-10: don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1389:9b-11: steng du dbu ma ni sgra gcan gyi rtsa ste
T02D1389:9b-12: stong pa 'bab par byed ma dang mi bskyod pa'i
T02D1389:9b-13: rang bzhin no // de kho na 'og tu g-yon
T02D1389:9b-14: pa khu ba'i rtsa ste ye shes 'bab par byed
T02D1389:9b-15: ma dang rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1389:9b-16: bshad pa'i rtsa steng du zla ba'i lam dang gcig
T02D1389:9b-17: tu 'gyur te bug pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1389:9b-18: ro // de bzhin du gci ba'i rtsa nyi ma dang gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1389:9b-19: de bzhin du skye ba la sogs pa bzhi la
T02D1389:9b-20: khu ba'i rtsa sgra gcan dang gcig tu 'gyur ro
T02D1389:9b-21: // steng du kun 'dar ma la sogs pa ming gsum ste /
T02D1389:9b-22: 'og tu mkha' 'gro gdong la sogs pa ming gsum mo //
T02D1389:9b-23: lte ba la sogs pa'i padma lnga'i ze'u 'bru rnams
T02D1389:9b-24: su 'byung ba'i kun 'dar mar son pa'i srog gi
T02D1389:9b-25: nus pa sa la sogs pa khams rnams rim pas
T02D1389:9b-26: 'bab ste / sdud pa yis ni shes pa phyi rol du 'bab pas khams zad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1389:9b-27: 'jug pa ni gtsug tor gyi padma la sogs pa'i rim pas sa la ste /
T02D1389:9b-28: lte ba'i padma la ngal so bar byed do //
T02D1389:9b-29: spro bas zhes pa nang du 'bab pas lus kyi khams 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1389:9b-30: de ltar kun 'dar mar 'gro ba dang 'ong bdag go //
T02D1389:9b-31: lhag par lus pa las rkyang ma dang ro ma
T02D1389:9b-32: dag la ni padma'i 'dab ma rnams la song ba
T02D1389:9b-33: dang 'ongs pa'o // lte ba la sogs pa gsum
T02D1389:9b-34: la rim pas lus la sogs pa gsum 'bab par
T02D1389:9b-35: byed pa dung can mar son pa'i thur sel gyi
T02D1389:9b-36: nus pa snga ma bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02D1389:9b-37: dung can ma 'di kho na chags pa'i bde ba las khu ba 'bab po //
T02D1389:9b-38: zla mtshan gyi dus sku ni de kho na khrag
T02D1389:9b-39: 'bab po zhes pa la sogs pas shes rab dang
T02D1389:9b-40: thabs 'khyud pa 'chad par 'gyur pa'i mdor bstan pa
T02D1389:9b-41: ni shes rab ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1389:9b-42: bud med rnams kyi dung can ma kho na rdul
T02D1389:10a-0: 'bab pa'i phyir gtum mo ste khu ba 'bab @10a
T02D1389:10a-2: kun 'dar ma ni rdul 'bab pa g-yung mo ste skyes pa'i ni kun 'dar ma kho na'o //
T02D1389:10a-3: sna bug g-yon pa la 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rim
T02D1389:10a-4: pas rnam par shes pa dang 'du byed dang tshor
T02D1389:10a-5: ba dang 'du shes dang gzugs zhes bya ba'i phung
T02D1389:10a-7: de bzhin du g-yas pa las dang chu dang me
T02D1389:10a-8: dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i khams lnga
T02D1389:10a-9: 'bab po // dbus su zhes pa kun 'dar ma
T02D1389:10a-10: la phung po dang khams kyi bdag nyid can drug
T02D1389:10a-11: pa ye shes kyi khams 'bab po //
T02D1389:10a-12: lte ba'i padma'i 'dab ma'i g-yon gyi 'dab ma drug
T02D1389:10a-13: po lug dang 'khrig pa dang seng ge dang srang
T02D1389:10a-14: dang gzhu dang bum pa'i bdag nyid can rnams la
T02D1389:10a-15: so sor rnam par shes pa la sogs pa lnga'i
T02D1389:10a-16: bdag nyid las dkyil 'khor sum cu rnams so //
T02D1389:10a-17: de bzhin du g-yas kyi 'dab ma drug po glang
T02D1389:10a-18: dang karka ta dang bu mo dang sdig pa dang
T02D1389:10a-19: chu srin dang nya'i bdag nyid can rnams la so
T02D1389:10a-20: sor sa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1389:10a-21: can nyid las dkyil 'khor sum cu rnams so //
T02D1389:10a-22: rtsa bar zhes pa bug pa g-yas pa'i gnas su
T02D1389:10a-23: dbyu gu re res sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1389:10a-25: sna bug g-yon pa'i 'dab ma'i dbus su zhes pa la sogs pas 'chad par 'gyur te /
T02D1389:10a-26: de la ltos pas na sna bug dag la'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1389:10a-27: sa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor kho na chu tshod de //
T02D1389:10a-28: de las chu tshod gcig ni 'jug pa dang 'byung
T02D1389:10a-29: ba dag gcig tu byas nas dbugs drug cu dang
T02D1389:10a-30: bcas pa'i brgya phrag gsum 'bab po //
T02D1389:10a-31: de ltar dkyil 'khor lngas dus sbyor zhes bya bas dbugs brgya phrag bco brgyad rnams so //
T02D1389:10a-32: de ltar dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyis brgya phrag drug
T02D1389:10a-33: lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dbugs dbyung
T02D1389:10a-35: lus la chu tshod drug cu rnams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1389:10a-36: sna bug g-yon pa la 'bab pa'i rim pa ni
T02D1389:10a-37: 'dab ma'i dbus su ni sna bug gi dbus su'o
T02D1389:10a-38: // phung po rten ni 'byung ba zhes pa'i gsung
T02D1389:10a-39: la brten pa rnam par shes pa la sogs pa
T02D1389:10a-40: phung po rnams dang lhan cig rten nam mkha' la
T02D1389:10a-41: rlung dang chu dang me dang sa'i khams kyi dbye
T02D1389:10a-42: // bas gsungs pa / nam mkha' sogs zhes bya'o //
T02D1389:10b-0: gzhan las @10b so zhes pa snga ma bzhin du rtsa ba nas brtsams nas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1389:10b-1: g-yon par rnam shes sogs pas 'byung ba zhes spro
T02D1389:10b-2: bar rnam par gzhag par bya ste zla ba yin
T02D1389:10b-4: g-yas par sa la sogs pas sdud pa ste nyi ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1389:10b-5: yang na gang g-yon par zla ba gnas pa shes
T02D1389:10b-6: rab dang bcas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1389:10b-7: rang bzhin rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D1389:10b-9: g-yas par thabs dang bcas pa'i spyan ma la sogs
T02D1389:10b-10: pa'i rang bzhin sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1389:10b-11: 'khor lo ste / sngags dang lha'i bdag nyid spro
T02D1389:10b-12: ba dang sdud pa'i ngo bo can lhan cig skyes
T02D1389:10b-13: pa sems can thams cad la gnas pa'o //
T02D1389:10b-14: shes rab ces pa la sogs pas mdor bstan pa
T02D1389:10b-15: de'i shes rab dang thabs nyid rgyas par 'chad de
T02D1389:10b-16: nub ces pa'o // snam bu so sor nub tu
T02D1389:10b-17: ste nub phyogs su sa'i rang bzhin spyan ma dang
T02D1389:10b-18: rnam par snang mdzad dag go //
T02D1389:10b-19: shar du rlung gi rang bzhin sgron ma dang don yod grub pa dag go //
T02D1389:10b-20: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi shes rab sgron
T02D1389:10b-21: ma ste don yod grub pa'i ni spyan ma'o zhes
T02D1389:10b-22: pa phan tshun zhal phyogs pas 'khyud pa'i nges pa'o
T02D1389:10b-23: // de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa'i thabs
T02D1389:10b-24: dang bral ba bsdus pa'i rgyud nyan pa ma rnyed
T02D1389:10b-25: pa rnams la yang dag par yid ches par byed
T02D1389:10b-26: pa'i don gsal bar shes par byed pa gsungs pa
T02D1389:10b-27: mthe bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1389:10b-28: gang gi phyir lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe chung la
T02D1389:10b-29: sogs pa sor mo lnga rnams nam mkha' la sogs
T02D1389:10b-30: pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyi dbus su mthe bo dang
T02D1389:10b-31: ming med sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin dag gis
T02D1389:10b-32: 'khyud pa tshim par byed pa'i phyag rgya ste gsang
T02D1389:10b-33: ba'i dbang bskur gyi don du slob ma'i kha dang
T02D1389:10b-34: lha mnyes par byed pa la yang ston pa de'i
T02D1389:10b-35: phyir sa dang rlung shes rab dang thabs nyid du
T02D1389:10b-36: grub po // 'dis bshad ba dang gci ba'i rtsa
T02D1389:10b-37: dag shes rab dang thabs nyid du gzhung btsugs so
T02D1389:10b-38: grub po // // g-yas su me'i rang bzhin gos dkar mo dang rin chen 'byung ldan dag go //
T02D1389:10b-39: gzhon nu chu'i rang bzhin m'a ma k'i dang 'od dpag tu med pa dag go //
T02D1389:10b-40: de la 'od dpag med kyi shes rab gos dkar
T02D1389:11a-0: mo ste rin chen 'byung ldan gyi m'a ma @11a
T02D1389:11a-2: / gang gi phyir lag pa g-yas pa'i gung mo
T02D1389:11a-3: dang mdzub mo me dang chu'i rang bzhin dag gis
T02D1389:11a-4: 'khyud pa ral gri'i phyag rgya la ston pa de'i
T02D1389:11a-5: phyir me dang chu dag shes rab thabs nyid du
T02D1389:11a-6: grub ste / 'dis ni ro ma dang rkyang ma dag shes rab dang thabs nyid do //
T02D1389:11a-7: dbu ma la steng gi phyogs su rnam par gnas
T02D1389:11a-8: pa stong pa'i ngo bo mi bskyod pa ni 'og
T02D1389:11a-9: gi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa mi 'gyur pa'i
T02D1389:11a-10: ye shes kyi bdag nyid can shes rab kyi pha
T02D1389:11a-11: rol tu phyin pa dang lhan cig 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1389:11a-12: phan tshun zhes pas 'chad par 'gyur pa'i steng dang
T02D1389:11a-13: 'og tu gnas pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
T02D1389:11a-14: ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' dag 'khyud pa yang
T02D1389:11a-15: ltos pa'o // snga ma phyed shes par byed pa ni /
T02D1389:11a-16: gang gi phyir lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur la
T02D1389:11a-17: mthe chung zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par byas pa
T02D1389:11a-18: / mi bskyod pa'i mche ba'i phyag rgya gang yin
T02D1389:11a-19: pa de kho na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1389:11a-20: phyin pa'i gri gug gi phyag rgya yin pa de'i
T02D1389:11a-21: phyir stong pa dang ye shes kyi rigs can dag
T02D1389:11a-22: shes rab dad thabs nyid do //
T02D1389:11a-23: 'dis ni kun 'dar ma dang dung can ma dag shes rab dang thabs nyid do //
T02D1389:11a-24: de ma thag tu 'chad par 'gyur pa'i tshigs su
T02D1389:11a-25: bcad pas rigs drug pa 'khyud pa'i shes par byed
T02D1389:11a-26: pa gsungs te / gang gi phyir lag pa'i mthil
T02D1389:11a-27: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa sbyar bar byas pa spyi
T02D1389:11a-28: bor bzung ba na gang gi tshe stong pa la
T02D1389:11a-29: sogs pa'i rang bzhin sor mo rnams phan tshun sbyor
T02D1389:11a-30: ba dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag sbyor ba byas
T02D1389:11a-31: pa de'i tshe rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse
T02D1389:11a-32: gcig pa'i phyag rgya yin zhing /
T02D1389:11a-33: de kho na rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i
T02D1389:11a-34: gri gug gi phyag rgya chu gri'i rnam pa can
T02D1389:11a-35: yin te / de'i phyir 'di dag shes rab dang thabs nyid do //
T02D1389:11a-36: phyi rol du gri gug dang bcas pa'i rdo rje
T02D1389:11a-37: rtse gcig pa'i bdag nyid rigs drug pa gang yin
T02D1389:11a-38: pa de yang nang du mnyam pa ste nyi ma
T02D1389:11a-39: dang zla ba mnyam par 'bab pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1389:11a-40: ro // dbu ma'i rtsa ste aa wa dh'u t'ir 'bab na'o ;
T02D1389:11a-41: / mnyam pa ni skye ba'i dus su 'bab pa las spro ba'i rgyu ste /
T02D1389:11a-42: 'chi ba'i dus su 'bab pa las sdud pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1389:11a-43: yang na rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi de kho na
T02D1389:11a-44: nyid sgom pas phyi rol du 'bab pa 'gags pa
T02D1389:11a-45: ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phung po la sogs
T02D1389:11a-46: pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyi phyir spro ba'i rgyu
T02D1389:11b-0: ste / @11b 'khor ba pa rnams kyi ma 'gags
T02D1389:11b-1: pa ni phung po la sogs pa rnam par 'jig
T02D1389:11b-2: par byed pa nyid kyis ni sdud pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1389:11b-3: de la mnyam pa ni sngar brjod pa'i sna bug g-yon par 'bab pa'i phung po lnga dang /
T02D1389:11b-4: sna bug g-yas par 'bab pa'i khams lnga dang /
T02D1389:11b-5: lte ba dang gsang ba dang nor bu'i padmar gnas
T02D1389:11b-6: pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams dbu
T02D1389:11b-7: ma'i rtsar son pa na gcig nyid yin gyi gzhan
T02D1389:11b-9: de ltar rlung 'bab pa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i zol
T02D1389:11b-10: gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha dang ye shes
T02D1389:11b-11: kyi rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa'o //
T02D1389:11b-12: gang gi tshe steng du zla ba dang nyi ma
T02D1389:11b-13: dang sgra gcan gyi rtsa rnams 'gog pa de'i tshe
T02D1389:11b-14: 'og tu bshang gci dang khu ba'i rtsa rnams 'gog
T02D1389:11b-15: pa'o // de bzhin du steng du gsum po grol na 'og tu 'ang grol ba'o //
T02D1389:11b-16: rtsa drug po de rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du spro ba dang sdud pa'i byed pa can no //
T02D1389:11b-17: lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la
T02D1389:11b-18: skyes pa tshe thung ba rnams kyi lus la rlung
T02D1389:11b-19: dang mkhris pa dang bad kan mi mnyam ste /
T02D1389:11b-20: mi mnyam pa las srog ces bya ba'i rlung dbyu
T02D1389:11b-21: gu lnga lnga 'bab pa'i rim pa las brgal nas
T02D1389:11b-22: g-yon pa'i rtsar lhag par 'bab po //
T02D1389:11b-23: ci ltar lhag ce na gsungs pa /
T02D1389:11b-24: mtshan mo gcig ste nyin mtshan 'bab pa de'i tshe
T02D1389:11b-25: 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag nas brtsams te lo gsum
T02D1389:11b-26: rnams kyis 'chi bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1389:11b-27: de bzhin du glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus
T02D1389:11b-28: sbyor la skyes pa rnams kyi rtsa g-yas pa la
T02D1389:11b-29: nyin mtshan lnga 'bab pa las lo gsum rnams kyis
T02D1389:11b-30: 'chi ba'o // de ltar mdor bstan nas re zhig nyi ma'i 'chi ltas rgyas par 'chad de /
T02D1389:11b-31: khyim gyi bdag nyid kyi 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa
T02D1389:11b-32: lte ba'i padma'i nang gi yongs su bskor ba'i shar
T02D1389:11b-33: gyi 'dab ma nyin mtshan lngar srog 'bab po //
T02D1389:11b-34: de nas g-yas su bskor bas 'dab ma gnyis pa la phyogs zhes pa bcu'o //
T02D1389:11b-35: gsum pa tshes rnams te bco lnga rnams so //
T02D1389:11b-37: lnga pa la de gnyis rnams te /
T02D1389:11b-38: nyi shu rtsa lnga rnams so //
T02D1389:11b-39: drug pa la de nyid rnams las gcig lhag rim pas te nyi shu rtsa drug go //
T02D1389:11b-40: bdun pa la slar yang gcig lhag rim pas te nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
T02D1389:12a-1: zhag sum cu gsum rgyu na zhes pa brgyad pa la bco lnga'o //
T02D1389:12a-4: bcu gcig pa la gsum rnams so zhes pa sum cu rtsa gsum rnams so //
T02D1389:12a-5: bcu gnyis pa la ni stong pa ste /
T02D1389:12a-6: slar yang g-yas pa'i rtsa la 'bab pa med pa'i
T02D1389:12a-7: phyir ro zhes pa 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag 'bab
T02D1389:12a-8: pa'i rim pa'o // da ni 'chi ltas kyi bdag nyid 'tsho ba'i dus kyi rim pa gsungs te /
T02D1389:12a-9: de rtogs pa'i don du yongs su zlum po rim pa gnyis pa bris pa las /
T02D1389:12a-10: gsum gnyis gcig ces pa ste lo rnams te /
T02D1389:12a-11: 'dab ma snga ma la gsum rnams so //
T02D1389:12a-12: gnyis pa la gnyis dag go //
T02D1389:12a-14: zla ba rnams kyang bzhi pa la drug go //
T02D1389:12a-18: nyin zhag rnams ni brgyad pa la bco lnga'o //
T02D1389:12a-21: bcu gcig pa la gnyis dag go //
T02D1389:12a-24: dang por 'dab ma sngon ma la nyin zhag lnga rnams 'bab po //
T02D1389:12a-25: de nas tshe lo brgya pa rnams kyi bzhin du
T02D1389:12a-26: 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyis 'tsho bar bya ba'i lo
T02D1389:12a-27: gsum gyi sum cu rtsa lngas lhag pa'i nyin zhag
T02D1389:12a-29: / de yang gzhan la zhugs pa las 'dab ma de skam mo //
T02D1389:12a-30: gnyis pa la nyin zhag bcu rnams 'bab po //
T02D1389:12a-31: yang 'pho ba bcu gcig gis nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lngas lhag pa'i sum brgya 'bab po /
T02D1389:12a-32: de bzhin du gsum pa la sogs pa la sngar ltar 'bab ste /
T02D1389:12a-33: de la gsum pa ni 'pho ba bcu gnyis zhag
T02D1389:12a-34: bdun cus lhag pa'i brgya 'bab cing skam par byed
T02D1389:12a-35: do // bzhi pa ni 'pho ba dgus nyin zhag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis 'bab cing skam mo //
T02D1389:12a-36: lnga pa ni 'pho ba brgyad kyi nyin zhag lnga bcu rtsa bdun 'bab cing skam par byed do //
T02D1389:12a-37: drug pa ni 'pho ba bdun gyis nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'bab cing ngo //
T02D1389:12a-38: bdun pa ni 'pho ba drug gis nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun 'bab cing ngo //
T02D1389:12a-39: brgyad pa ni 'pho ba lngas nyin zhag bco lnga 'bab cing ngo //
T02D1389:12a-40: dgu pa ni 'pho ba bzhis nyin zhag bcu 'bab cing ngo //
T02D1389:12a-41: bcu pa ni 'pho ba gsum gyis nyin zhag lnga 'bab cing ngo //
T02D1389:12b-0: bcu gcig pa ni 'pho ba gnyis kyis nyin zhag @12b gsum 'bab cing ngo //
T02D1389:12b-1: de ltar bcu gcig skam ste mkhris pa'i bdag nyid can rdul gyi khams skam pa las so //
T02D1389:12b-2: 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa la g-yas pa'i rtsa dor
T02D1389:12b-3: nas rtsa g-yon pa la 'pho ba med pas nyin
T02D1389:12b-5: bad kan gyi bdag nyid snying stobs kyi khams skam par byed pa las 'dab ma de skam mo //
T02D1389:12b-6: de nas padma'i ze'u 'bru la dbu ma'i rtsa la
T02D1389:12b-7: 'pho ba med pas nyin zhag gcig 'bab cing rlung
T02D1389:12b-8: gi rang bzhin mun pa'i khams zad pa las de
T02D1389:12b-9: bskams nas lam g-yas pas nges par 'byung ste /
T02D1389:12b-10: rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa srid pa gzhan du 'pho'o //
T02D1389:12b-12: rtsa ba nas zhes pa lte ba'i 'khor lo'i lug
T02D1389:12b-13: la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi bdag
T02D1389:12b-14: nyid kyi 'dab ma snga ma nas brtsams te gcig
T02D1389:12b-15: lhag pas zhes pa gcig dang gnyis la sogs pa'i
T02D1389:12b-16: rim pas te ji srid du nyin zhag sum cu
T02D1389:12b-17: rtsa gsum gyi bar du 'dab ma bcu gcig la
T02D1389:12b-18: rtsa g-yon par zla ba'i rlung 'bab po //
T02D1389:12b-19: ji lta bur gcig lhag pas shen gsungs pa /
T02D1389:12b-20: sngon ma'i snying po'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag gcig 'bab po //
T02D1389:12b-21: nyin zhag des dman pa'i zla ba gnyis ji lta ba bzhin du 'bab po //
T02D1389:12b-22: de nas zla ba gsum pa'i dang por 'dab ma
T02D1389:12b-23: de nyid la nyin zhag gnyis g-yon pa la 'bab
T02D1389:12b-24: po // nyin zhag des dman pa'i gsum pa dang bzhi pa la ji lta ba bzhin 'bab po //
T02D1389:12b-25: zla ba lnga por nyin zhag gsum 'dab ma de la g-yon par 'bab po //
T02D1389:12b-26: nyin zhag des dman pa'i zla ba lnga pa dang drug pa dag ji lta ba bzhin 'bab po //
T02D1389:12b-27: de ltar snga ma dang lhan cig bgrang bar bya
T02D1389:12b-28: ba'i zla ba dang po dang gsum pa dang lnga
T02D1389:12b-29: pa'i dang por skyes pa'i gsum po 'di rnams kho
T02D1389:12b-30: na 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag rnams su rnam par
T02D1389:12b-31: gzhag par bya'o // yang na rnam par ma chad
T02D1389:12b-32: par 'bab pa'i phung po'i nyin zhag rnam par bzhag
T02D1389:12b-33: nas 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gsum mo //
T02D1389:12b-34: 'dis ni lo gsum la sngar nyin zhag gsum dang zla ba drug song ngo //
T02D1389:12b-35: de bzhin du padma 'dab ma gnyis pa la zla
T02D1389:12b-36: ba bdun pa'i dang por 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag
T02D1389:12b-37: bzhi'o // brgyad pa'i dang por lnga'o //
T02D1389:12b-38: dgu pa'i dang por drug ste /
T02D1389:13a-0: de ltar snga ma bzhin du nyin zhag gsum du rnam par bzhag @13a * //
T02D1389:13a-1: nas 'dab ma snga ma'i nyin zhag gsum rnams dang lhan cig nyin zhag drug rnams 'chi ltas so //
T02D1389:13a-2: nyin zhag gzhan rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1389:13a-3: 'dis kyang nyin zhag gsum song ste /
T02D1389:13a-4: de ltar zla ba gsum gsum rnams kyis nyin zhag
T02D1389:13a-5: gsum rnam par 'phel ba las 'dab ma bcu gcig
T02D1389:13a-6: po rnams lo gsum po 'dis rim pas 'dor ro
T02D1389:13a-7: // de ltar 'dab ma bcu gcig la 'bab pa
T02D1389:13a-8: las bad kan gyi bdag nyid snying stobs kyi khams
T02D1389:13a-10: 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa la rtsa g-yas pa la
T02D1389:13a-11: 'bab pa las 'dab ma gzhan rnams la gnas pa
T02D1389:13a-12: / zla ba gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dang drug
T02D1389:13a-13: pa dang 'brel pa'i nyin zhag gsum po'i nyin zhag
T02D1389:13a-14: / gnyis zad de / mkhris pa'i bdag nyid rdul gyi khams zad pa las te /
T02D1389:13a-15: 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa skam pa las so //
T02D1389:13a-16: snga ma bzhin du ze'u 'bru la nyin zhag gcig
T02D1389:13a-17: dbu ma 'bab pa las rlung gi bdag nyid can
T02D1389:13a-18: mun pa'i khams bskams par byas nas sred pa gzhan
T02D1389:13a-19: du 'gro ba'o // rtogs pa'i don du bri ba'i
T02D1389:13a-20: rim pa ni khyim bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lo rim
T02D1389:13a-22: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bcu gcig rnams dang
T02D1389:13a-23: rtsa gsum rnams dang drug dang dgu dang bcu gnyis
T02D1389:13a-24: dang bco lnga dang bco brgyad dang nyi shu rtsa
T02D1389:13a-25: gcig dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang nyi shu rtsa
T02D1389:13a-26: bdun dang sum cu dang sum cu rtsa gsum rnams
T02D1389:13a-27: te / bcu gnyis pa la ni g-yon ba med pa'i phyir stong pa'o //
T02D1389:13a-28: phyi'i 'dab ma bcu gnyis rnams la rim pas zla
T02D1389:13a-29: ba rnams ni sum cu dang nyi shu rtsa bdun
T02D1389:13a-30: dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D1389:13a-31: dang bco brgyad dang bco lnga dang bcu gnyis dang
T02D1389:13a-32: bcu dang drug dang gsum dang /
T02D1389:13a-33: bcu gcig pa la zla ba gsum zad pa gsal bar byed pa stong pa dang /
T02D1389:13a-34: bcu gnyis pa la nyin zhag gnyis so //
T02D1389:13a-35: lte ba la nyin zhag gcig go ;
T02D1389:13a-36: / de ltar gsum la sogs pa nyin zhag la 'chi ltas 'phel zhing /
T02D1389:13a-37: sum cu la sogs pa'i nyin zhag gi bdag nyid 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i dge ba 'grib pa'o //
T02D1389:13a-38: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba bcu dang ldan pa'i
T02D1389:13a-39: lo dgu bcu rtsa drug gi mtshams ni nyi ma
T02D1389:13a-40: dang zla ba 'bab pa'i dus so //
T02D1389:13b-0: @13b nyin zhag gsum gyis dman pa'i phyogs gsum lo
T02D1389:13b-1: gsum lo brgya gang bar byed pa la dbu ma'i
T02D1389:13b-4: gnyis la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mthar
T02D1389:13b-5: thug pa ma nyam pa'i nyin zhag rnams kyis g-yas
T02D1389:13b-6: pa la dang / gcig la sogs pa sum cu
T02D1389:13b-7: rtsa gsum gyi mthar thug pa mi mnyam pa'i nyin
T02D1389:13b-8: zhag rnams kyis g-yon pa la de'i ste 'chi ba'i
T02D1389:13b-9: pa la dang / rgyu ba'o // 'di ltar yang
T02D1389:13b-10: skye ba'i dus su skyes pa glang la sogs pa'i
T02D1389:13b-11: dus sbyor gyi sa la sogs pa gang yang rung
T02D1389:13b-13: de bzhin du lug la sogs pa'i dus sbyor gyi
T02D1389:13b-14: stong pa la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil
T02D1389:13b-16: dkyil 'khor de nas brtsams te zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1389:13b-17: 'di yan g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi khams dang
T02D1389:13b-18: phung po la sogs pa 'bab pa rnam par nyams
T02D1389:13b-19: pa'i dbang du byas te lag pa phyis pa la
T02D1389:13b-24: mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes pa'i ni thog mar g-yas pa la nyin zhag gnyis 'bab po //
T02D1389:13b-25: yang nyin zhag gnyis ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1389:13b-26: de nas g-yon pa la nyin zhag gcig go //
T02D1389:13b-27: nyin zhag gcig ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1389:13b-28: nyin zhag bzhi rnams g-yas pa la'o //
T02D1389:13b-29: bzhi rnams ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1389:13b-30: gsum rnams g-yon pa la ste gsum rnams ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1389:13b-31: drug rnams g-yas pa la ste drug rnams ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1389:13b-32: lnga g-yon pa la ste lnga rnams ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1389:13b-33: de bzhin du ji srid sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
T02D1389:13b-34: bar g-yas pa la ste sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
T02D1389:13b-35: bar ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1389:13b-36: sum cu rtsa gsum g-yon pa la dang sum cu rtsa gsum ji lta ba bzhin gyi bar du'o //
T02D1389:13b-37: 'dir g-yas pa la gnyis la sogs pa sum cu'i
T02D1389:13b-38: mthar thug pa mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gsum gsum rnams
T02D1389:13b-39: kyis rim pas sal sogs pa'i khams zad pa'o //
T02D1389:13b-40: g-yon pa la gcig la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa
T02D1389:13b-41: dgu'i mthar thug pa mi mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gsum
T02D1389:13b-42: gsum rnams kyis nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams zad
T02D1389:13b-43: pa ste rim pa las so //
T02D1389:14a-0: de nas nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gcig gis snying stobs kyi khams @14a * //
T02D1389:14a-2: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyis rdul gyi khams zad pa'o //
T02D1389:14a-3: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum rnams kyis mun pa'i khams zad pa'o //
T02D1389:14a-4: mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes pa rnams kyis
T02D1389:14a-5: ni gcig la sogs pa'i rim pas 'bab pa'o zhes
T02D1389:14a-7: / de ltar nyin zhag gsum gyis dman pa'i lo
T02D1389:14a-8: brgyad ste de'i steng du nyin zhag sum cu rtsa
T02D1389:14a-9: bzhi rnams rgyu'o // de la nyin zhag gcig g-yas pa la'o //
T02D1389:14a-10: nyin zhag gcig g-yon pa la'o //
T02D1389:14a-11: de lta bu'i rim pas ji srid du nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du 'bab po /
T02D1389:14a-12: de nas rim pas khams dang phung po dang yul
T02D1389:14a-13: dang dbang po dang las kyi dbang po'i bya ba
T02D1389:14a-14: dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams kyi zad pa'o
T02D1389:14a-15: // de nas dbu ma la nyin zhag gcig ste /
T02D1389:14a-16: de las phung po la sogs pa drug pa rnams bskams nas srid pa gzhan du 'gro ba'o //
T02D1389:14a-17: de ltar 'chi ltas mtshan nyid shes nas ni /
T02D1389:14a-18: rnal 'byor pas de slu ba'i thabs gsungs te /
T02D1389:14a-19: nyi ma'i 'chi ltas su gyur na rdo rje skyil
T02D1389:14a-20: krung bcing sa nas srog rtsol sngon du 'gro bar
T02D1389:14a-21: dpung pa g-yas pas nu ma g-yas pa btsir ba
T02D1389:14a-22: las dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab pa'i bdag nyid g-yas pa
T02D1389:14a-23: las bkug nas g-yon pa la srog yang dag par
T02D1389:14a-24: rgyu bar bya'o ; / de yis nyi ma'i 'chi ltas ldog go //
T02D1389:14a-25: de bzhin du g-yon pa las g-yas pa la ste zla ba'i 'chi ltas ldog go //
T02D1389:14a-26: de bzhin du skyil krung byas nas thig ler te /
T02D1389:14a-27: dpral bar gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa
T02D1389:14a-28: dkar po'i dbus su srog rtsol sngon du 'gro bar
T02D1389:14a-30: de bzhin du skyil krung byas nas aa wa dh'u
T02D1389:14a-31: t'i'i zhabs ni lte ba'i padma 'dab ma drug cu
T02D1389:14a-33: de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la aam yig
T02D1389:14a-34: dkar po re kh'a phyed kyi rnam pa srog rtsol
T02D1389:14a-35: dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1389:14a-37: rdo rje rtag tu bslang bar bya //
T02D1389:14a-38: rang gi lag pa la sogs pas ji ltar thig le phyi rol du mi 'byung ba ltar te /
T02D1389:14a-39: 'chi ltas kyi rgyu zla nyi'i bgrod pa 'joms pa nyid las so //
T02D1389:14a-40: thabs 'di gtso bor gsungs pa gzhan du zhes pa'o //
T02D1389:14a-41: steng gi 'chi ltas slu ba dang bcas pa gsungs nas 'og gi 'chi ltas gsungs pa /
T02D1389:14b-0: dung @14b can mar me rtsa la yang //
T02D1389:14b-1: zhes pa bshang ba dang gci ba 'bab pa dag

T02D1389:17b-22: gzhon nu ma zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa bdun gsal lo //
T02D1389:17b-23: khu ba zhes pa ste gang gi phyir rten khu
T02D1389:17b-24: ba 'phos na brten par bya ba 'jig pa de'i
T02D1389:17b-25: phyir khu ba mi 'gyur pa kho na nyid kyis
T02D1389:17b-26: bde ba chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1389:17b-27: ji srid du rten dang brten par bya ba tha
T02D1389:17b-28: dad pa de srid du gtsug tor du gang ba
T02D1389:17b-30: / mchog tu 'gyur med las byung ba'i sku'i bde
T02D1389:17b-31: ba chen po'i mdzod spu ni dpral ba'i 'khor lo
T02D1389:17b-32: ste / der nges par 'gro ba nyid kyis gtsug
T02D1389:17b-33: tor du son pa'i cha bcu drug pa shugs las
T02D1389:17b-35: aa yig la sogs pa dbyangs yongs su gyur pa
T02D1389:17b-36: zla ba dang ka la sogs pa yongs su gyur
T02D1389:17b-38: de dag yang dag par sbyor ba ni rten ma yin zhing /
T02D1389:17b-39: h'um yig la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil
T02D1389:17b-40: 'khor dang gtso bo yang ni brten pa ma yin
T02D1389:17b-41: te rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1389:18a-0: 'on kyang gtsug tor dang nor bu'i lte bar gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma dag @18a * //
T02D1389:18a-2: thams cad la khyab pa'i bde ba chen po brten par bya ba'o //
T02D1389:18a-3: kun rdzob kyi rnam pa thams cad pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan ni rgyu ste /
T02D1389:18a-4: khu ba mi 'gyur pa las skyes pa 'bras bu'o //
T02D1389:18a-5: de dag phan tshun rgyas btab pa nyid de /
T02D1389:18a-6: rgyu yang bde ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D1389:18a-7: 'bras bu yang dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1389:18a-9: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1389:18a-10: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje dag dbyer med pa'i
T02D1389:18a-11: byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de goms par
T02D1389:18a-12: byed pa'i dus na rgyu ste /
T02D1389:18a-13: sgom pa mthar thug par gyur pa'i dus na ni 'bras bu'o //
T02D1389:18a-14: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes pa la sogs pas 'di'i mtha' gnyis dang bral ba gsungs so //
T02D1389:18a-16: gzugs brnyan ni chad pa min te /
T02D1389:18a-17: chos thams cad dmigs pa med par 'gyur pa'i rang
T02D1389:18a-18: bzhin du dngos med las so so rang gis rig
T02D1389:18a-19: par bya ba skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1389:18a-20: 'bras bu yang rtag pa nyid ma yin te nor
T02D1389:18a-21: bu las steng du son pa'i khu ba'i ngo bo
T02D1389:18a-22: las 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa'i
T02D1389:18a-23: zag pa med pa'i bde ba yang dag par byung
T02D1389:18a-24: ba'i phyir ro // dngos med dang dngos po dag
T02D1389:18a-25: gis brjod zin pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi stong pa
T02D1389:18a-26: nyid dang snying rje dag ste /
T02D1389:18a-28: gnyis ka'i bdag nyid 'di ni ma ning gi go 'phang ste /
T02D1389:18a-29: shes rab dang thabs 'ba' zhig pa'i phyogs dag med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1389:18a-30: shes rab ces pa gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan nyid can chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
T02D1389:18a-31: de yang rgyu las ma byung ste /
T02D1389:18a-32: rang bzhin ni ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1389:18a-33: shes rab kho na rgyu ste /
T02D1389:18a-34: de las byung ba'ang 'bras bu yin la /
T02D1389:18a-35: shes rab rgyu las skyes pa min pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1389:18a-36: ci ltar de las skyes pa rgyu las skye ba yin /
T02D1389:18a-37: sngar kho nar rgyu'i gtam gsal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1389:18a-38: de phyir ye zhes pa phyed go sla'o //
T02D1389:18a-39: 'bras bu kho nas rgyu la rgyas btab pa'am rgyu
T02D1389:18a-40: kho nas 'bras bu la zhes pa phan tshun du'ang
T02D1389:18a-41: mi 'gyur la / 'bras bus kyang rgyu rgyas btab cing /
T02D1389:18a-42: rgyu yis kyang 'bras bu zhes phan tshun du yang mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1389:18b-2: gang gi phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gtan nas
T02D1389:18b-3: byung ba nyid kyi phyir te kun rdzob pa las
T02D1389:18b-4: so // gnyis ka dbyer med pa'i gzugs brnyan ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1389:18b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung chos
T02D1389:18b-7: rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa kho na'o
T02D1389:18b-8: zhes so // gang gi phyir gnyis ka dbyer med
T02D1389:18b-9: pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi shes rab kyi cha gdod ma
T02D1389:18b-10: nas zhi ba nyid kyi phyir rtag tu ma skyes
T02D1389:18b-11: zhes so // pa dang / thabs kyi cha so
T02D1389:18b-12: so rang gis rig bya nyid kyi phyir rtag tu
T02D1389:18b-14: de'i phyir yang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ma yin
T02D1389:18b-15: zhing phan tshun rgyas btab pa yang ma yin no
T02D1389:18b-16: // phan tshun rgyas btab pa med pa nyid la rigs pa gzhan ni /
T02D1389:18b-17: rab tu shes par bya ba gang sna tshogs gzugs phyi rol las rnam par phye ba mthong ste /
T02D1389:18b-18: de ni rang gi sems las gzhan ma yin no //
T02D1389:18b-19: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T02D1389:18b-20: ral zhes pa la sogs pa dpe'o //
T02D1389:18b-21: 'o na brjod zin pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi lam
T02D1389:18b-22: sgom pa med par mi 'gyur pa'i bde ba skye
T02D1389:18b-23: ba med na / des na ci ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po med ce na /
T02D1389:18b-24: gsungs pa mo gsham zhes pa ste /
T02D1389:18b-25: 'dis ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po de kho na nyid ma yin pa gsungs so //
T02D1389:18b-26: shes rab ma yin zhes pa ste /
T02D1389:18b-27: 'di ni brjod zin pa'i shes rab dang lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D1389:18b-28: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1389:18b-29: rang byung zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs su bcad
T02D1389:18b-30: pa gsum ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems dpa'
T02D1389:18b-32: dmigs pa las 'byung ba'i phyir 'di ni rang 'byung ngo //
T02D1389:18b-33: gsang ba la sogs pa gtsug tor gyi mthar thug
T02D1389:18b-34: pa 'khor lo drug tu rim pas rdo rje sems
T02D1389:18b-35: dpa' dang sems dpa' chen po dang byang chub sems
T02D1389:18b-36: dpa' dang dam tshig sems dpa' dang /
T02D1389:18b-37: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang dus kyi 'khor lo ste drug gi ming can no //
T02D1389:18b-39: rdo rje ni stong pa'i gzugs te /
T02D1389:18b-40: de gang gi phyir mi phyed pa de'i phyir te /
T02D1389:18b-41: don chen ni mdor bstan par ro //
T02D1389:18b-42: sems dpa' ni gang 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa'i
T02D1389:18b-43: ngo bo lus dang ngag dang sems gcig pa nyid
T02D1389:19a-1: mchog tu mi 'gyur par mdor bstan par bya'o zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1389:19a-2: de ni chen po ste bde ba chen pos gang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1389:19a-3: 'dod chags chen pos ni mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1389:19a-4: de yang sems dpa' ste sa yis gang bar byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1389:19a-5: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed ba ni mdor bstan pa'o zhes pa sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D1389:19a-6: 'di ni gang gi phyir byang chub la ste chos
T02D1389:19a-7: kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa mi g-yo ba ste
T02D1389:19a-8: / de nyid nyon mongs pa la sogs pa zhe
T02D1389:19a-9: sdang gi tshogs rnams las rnam par rgyal ba nyid
T02D1389:19a-10: kyi phyir zhe sdang chen po'o //
T02D1389:19a-11: dgra che ba yang mdor bstan pa'o ;
T02D1389:19a-12: / sems dpa' ni zhes pa byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D1389:19a-13: dam tshig las dam tshig gi ste zla ba bdud
T02D1389:19a-14: rtsi zhes bya ba khu ba'i sems dpa' ni 'pho
T02D1389:19a-15: ba med kyi ngo bo ste /
T02D1389:19a-17: gti mug las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyir gti mug chen po'o //
T02D1389:19a-18: gti mug gi blo can rnams kyi gti mug 'joms par byed pa yang mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1389:19a-19: de'i phyir dam tshig sems dpa'o //
T02D1389:19a-20: de nyid ni gang gi phyir sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams /
T02D1389:19a-21: shes rab gzugs brnyan dang mi 'gyur pa'i thig le
T02D1389:19a-22: rnams dang lhan cig sbyor ba ni gcig nyid do
T02D1389:19a-23: // khro ba las nges par rgyal ba'i phyir khro bo chen po ste /
T02D1389:19a-24: bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa'i phyir khros
T02D1389:19a-25: pa'i bdud kyi dgra bo yang mdor bstan pa'o zhes
T02D1389:19a-27: de ni gang gi phyir dus bde ba chen po ste /
T02D1389:19a-28: thabs de las mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi don
T02D1389:19a-29: yongs su ma btang ba ni 'khor lo zhes bya
T02D1389:19a-31: de nyid kyi phyir sems can grol du bcug nas
T02D1389:19a-32: chags pa chen po 'gyur pa'i chags pa sel bar
T02D1389:19a-33: byed pa yang mdor bstan pa'o zhes pa dus kyi
T02D1389:19a-34: 'khor lo'o // rtsa drug gi ngo bo'i rtsibs drug
T02D1389:19a-35: pa'i 'khor lo la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D1389:19a-36: pa 'di rnams so sor rnam pa drug rnams so
T02D1389:19a-37: 'khor lo'o // // de la dung can ma'i ngo
T02D1389:19a-38: bo 'og gi rtsibs la mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes
T02D1389:19a-39: 'khor lo'o // // so // ra sa n'a'i ngo bo lho'i rtsibs la mi 'gyur pa'i tshor ba'o //
T02D1389:19a-40: aa wa dh'u t'i'i ngo bo steng gi rtsibs la mi 'gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1389:19b-0: bshang ba'i rtsa'i ngo bo nub kyi @19b rtsibs la mi 'gyur pa'i gzugs so //
T02D1389:19b-1: gci ba'i rtsa'i ngo bo shar gyi rtsibs la mi 'gyur pa'i 'du byed do //
T02D1389:19b-2: la la n'a'i ngo bo byang gi rtsibs la mi
T02D1389:19b-3: 'gyur pa'i 'du shes so zhes pa phung po drug
T02D1389:19b-4: rnams so // rigs drug po de rnams kho na
T02D1389:19b-5: rim pa ji lta bar mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes
T02D1389:19b-6: la sogs pa khams drug rnams kyis so //
T02D1389:19b-7: de bzhin du mi 'gyur pa'i yid la sogs pa dbang po drug po rnams kyi ste /
T02D1389:19b-8: de bzhin du mi 'gyur pa'i sgra la sogs pa yul drug po rnams kyi dang /
T02D1389:19b-9: dbang pos nye bar mtshon pa las ni 'gyur pa'i
T02D1389:19b-10: mchog gi dbang po dang lag pa dang mdoms dang
T02D1389:19b-11: bshang lam dang rkang pa zhes bya ba las kyi
T02D1389:19b-13: de bzhin du yul gyi nye bar mtshon pa las
T02D1389:19b-14: mi 'gyur pa'i khu ba 'pho ba dang len pa
T02D1389:19b-15: dang / gci ba 'dzag pa dang bshang ba gtong
T02D1389:19b-16: ba dang smra ba dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba
T02D1389:19b-17: las kyi dbang po'i bya ba rnams kyi'o //
T02D1389:19b-18: sum cu rtsa drug po 'di rnams rim pas dkyil 'khor la ste /
T02D1389:19b-19: 'dod pa chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D1389:19b-20: 'dod chags chen po zhes bya ba rin chen dbang po dang /
T02D1389:19b-21: khro ba chen po zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D1389:19b-22: gti mug chen po zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1389:19b-23: zhe sdang chen po zhes bya ba don yod grub pa dang /
T02D1389:19b-24: chags pa chen po zhes bya ba 'od dpag tu
T02D1389:19b-25: med pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D1389:19b-26: pa dang gos dkar mo dang /
T02D1389:19b-27: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang spyan ma dang sgrol ma dang m'a ma k'i rnams dang /
T02D1389:19b-28: kun du bzang po dang sa'i snying po dang /
T02D1389:19b-29: phyag na rdo rje dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D1389:19b-30: nam mkha'i snying po dang 'jig rten dbang phyug rnams dang /
T02D1389:19b-31: sgra rdo rje ma dang ro rdo rje ma dang
T02D1389:19b-32: chos dbyings rdo rje ma dang dri rdo rje ma
T02D1389:19b-33: dang reg bya rdo rje ma dang gzugs rdo rje
T02D1389:19b-35: gnod mdzes dang shes rab mthar byed dang gtsug tor dang /
T02D1389:19b-37: bgegs mthar byed dang padma mthar byed rnams dang /
T02D1389:19b-38: cher sngon mo dang rmugs byed ma dang drag spyan
T02D1389:19b-39: ma dang rengs byed ma dang brtson 'grus chen mo
T02D1389:19b-40: dang khengs byed ma rnams so //
T02D1389:19b-41: rigs sum cu rtsa drug la khyab par byed pa
T02D1389:20a-0: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thugs rdo rje @20a *
T02D1389:20a-1: // 'di yang sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags
T02D1389:20a-2: la sogs pa 'gog pa'i phyir khro bo'i rgyal po
T02D1389:20a-3: // ste / 'dod ba chen po la sogs pa'i gdong drug pa'o //
T02D1389:20a-4: 'chi bdag gi bdud la sogs pa 'jigs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa'o //
T02D1389:20a-5: brjod zin pa'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rigs drug dag pa'o //
T02D1389:20a-6: lus zhes pa sku'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1389:20a-7: gsang ba dbang po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1389:20a-10: gsum po 'di'i bdag nyid 'di ni rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1389:20a-11: de yang lam bsgoms pas dag pa ni sngar bshad
T02D1389:20a-12: pa'i rnam par dag pa drag po shes rab dang
T02D1389:20a-13: thabs kyi rdo rje gsum po rnams kyi rdo rje
T02D1389:20a-14: sems dpa' bsam du med pa'i thugs rdo rje nyid
T02D1389:20a-16: 'di ni ste dbang mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1389:20a-17: rab tu byed pa ni bshad zin pa ni dbang
T02D1389:20a-18: bskur bcu'i sgrub thabs dang mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i
T02D1389:20a-19: dbang bskur gyi sgrub thabs te /
T02D1389:20a-20: brjod zin pa'i rtsa dang rigs rab tu gsal bar byed pa ni /
T02D1389:20a-21: kye zla ba bzang po phyag na rdo rje mdor bstan pas te /
T02D1389:20a-22: mdor bsdus pas gsal bar bshad do zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1389:20a-23: nags phyogs rtsa ba phyung nas rtag tu ni //
T02D1389:20a-24: 'jig rten rnams la bde ba ster gyur cig / nyon mongs tsha ba sel bar byed pa yi //
T02D1389:20a-25: dbang bskur zla ba'i zla 'od gsal bar brjod //
T02D1389:20a-26: dbang bskur mdor bstan pa'i brjed byang 'di ni dpal
T02D1389:20a-27: dus kyi 'khor lo pa pandi ta rnam par rgyal
T02D1389:20a-28: ba dbang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o /
T02D1389:20a-30: // / gzhung gi tshad ni tshigs su bcad pa bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis lhag pa'i brgya phrag bzhi'o //
T02D1389:20a-31: lo ts'a ba'i ming tsam 'dzin pa dpang dpal ldan
